summary.position: Post Doctoral Researcher in Human-Centered AI for Software Engineering
summary.department: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering
summary.research_focus: Empirical Software Engineering (EMSE), Human-Centered Adoption of Artificial Intelligence for Software Engineering

responsibilities.main_responsibility: Conduct research on Large Language Models within the context of software project management
responsibilities.collaboration: Work with a team of researchers and practitioners from leading Danish universities and software companies
responsibilities.expected_contributions: Engage in existing research projects and facilitate multidisciplinary collaboration

partners.name: industrial partners in Denmark and Sweden

collaboration.project: AI4SE1DK - Human-Centered Adoption of Artificial Intelligence for Software Engineering

eligibility.degree: PhD in Computer Science or related field
qualifications: Solid research experience in applied AI, particularly with Large Language Models
Main author of at least one journal publication in the area of AI4SE
Fast learner with interests in multidisciplinary research
Excellent English skills, both orally and written
Ability to collaborate effectively within a multidisciplinary and multicultural team

submission_info.application_details: Applications must include a CV, degree certificate, list of publications, statement of future research plans, teaching portfolio, and verified information on previous teaching experience

program_highlights: Access to a rich ecosystem of researchers and practitioners
Collaboration with industry for practical validation of research
summary.description: This position is funded by Innovation Fund Denmark Grand Solutions project focusing on the responsible and human-centered adoption of AI technologies in software engineering.
summary.application_procedure: Shortlisting will be used for the selection process, with notifications sent to applicants regarding their application status.
